mapper.sql: select a.*,b.store_name,f.price ,c.device_name as light_name,d.device_name as camera_name from t_store_desk a join t_store b on a.store_id=b.store_id left join t_device c on c.device_id=a.light_device_id left join t_device d on d.device_id=a.camera_device_id left join t_desk_price f on a.desk_type=f.desk_type and a.store_id=f.store_id
